extendedInfo.description: Would you like your phone to alert you when the ISS, shuttle, or even spy sats are flying overhead? Simple! Satellite Flybys turns your phone into a full-featured satellite tracker with flyby alarms and more.If you want to learn something about the satellites you are seeing instead of just getting a name and a number (what is an SL-16 R/B anyway?) this is the app that does that.  For each satellite listed there is a description and a photo (when available).  And our dataset is maintained by pros so we only track the most interesting of the 100's of visible satellites.As an educational tool for casual sky watchers, Satellite Flybys beats the others hands down.  And if you are an avid satellite spotter, this app is a good way to introduce others to your hobby.  Also, unlike some of the other satellite spotting apps, the flyby predictions are stored so they are available offline.  That's important if you go out to a nice dark sky area to view flybys and don't happen to have cell coverage there.

reviews.title: does not work for me in uk
reviews.comment: downloaded it to my google nexus 4 running jellybean 4.2.1. Tried using the GPS but it will not pick up my location, the app thinks i am in new york, and will not recognise a uk postcode when i try and manually force it to my location. All my other apps ie google maps and navigation recongnis my location so the app is at fault not the phone. i appear to have wasted my money on this app.
reviews.author: Jonathan Lamb

reviews.title: Does what it says..
reviews.comment: Great product.. Accurate. I set reminders and go out with my children to see the ISS or other rockets.   Kinda cool to do that.
reviews.author: Kevin Thompson

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money....
reviews.comment: I have yet to find a satellite using this app. Not sure if database or location reference is corrupt but I\'ve \"missed\" all the viewings the app has showed for multiple nights. However, each night I see multiple satellites go over that aren\'t shown in the app...these aren\'t faint passes, they are very obvious. Also, it has no sky view map to show the path through the sky. Waste of money & time...just use internet until app improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: My Motor Droid alarm goes and goes until I interact to turn it off. Other than that I love the app.My daughter loves to run out to see the \"rockets\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried this and heavens above which is better and for free. No refund as I didn\'t know about 15 min trial rule :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app! Would be 5 stars if you\'ll integrate with GoogleSkyMap app. MotoDroid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What
reviews.comment: Programme force closes when location is entered. Gps doesn\'t work and always resets to new york on start. This was a good program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App!!
reviews.comment: I like that when I look at the list of visible satellites, that the bigger the dot, the more visible or Brighter the satellite is. It\'s fun that when I am with my friends, I can drag them all outside and see a satellite (the reminder feature is handy too). This app is pretty easy to use. I like it!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Me and my friend tested this app in Shropshire, united  kingdom we tracked the international space station and it appeared in the correct direction the correct time by the second and finally proved it wasn\'t a UFO me and my freind kept seeing, love this app the information is great as well, thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app.
reviews.comment: Me and my children go out to watch satellites pass overhead all the time since getting this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix the app for Samsung Galaxy Nexus & ICS
reviews.comment: This app. does not work on the Samsung Galaxy Nexus & Ice Cream Sandwich.  Opens up to a black screen with a grey box in the bottom left corner.  It worked fine on the HTC Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not accurate, wrong dates.
reviews.comment: Do you use this and find that you \'miss\' an ISS pass?  You didn\'t miss it, this thing is wrong!  The ISS is too bright to miss.  Try on line sources instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update especially sharing option!
reviews.comment: This is a great app, but it needs some updating. There is no way to share or tweet the information which is a great item needing to be added. Please update this app and allow sharing on Facebook and Twitter!
reviews.author: Marvin Huddleston

reviews.comment: Lowered to two stars. The app is really only good for tracking the ISS. It only shows a select few other satellites. The list never updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun entertaining
reviews.author: corey winston

reviews.title: Dev Please Update
reviews.comment: Looks horrible on 10 inch tablet running ICS. Please update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money. Your better off using the web service
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great. Fun to watch the ISS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app. Great educational tool with the descriptions and photos.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Id give it 5 stars if it ran off the sd card.
reviews.author: Jason McPeak
